abstract: Harvey Araton Sports of The Times column notes that New York Yankees young pitcher Ivan Nova provided superb relief for starter C C Sabathia in the resumption of rain-suspended Game 1 of the American League division series with the Detroit Tigers.
snippet: When the American League division series resumed Saturday night, still Game 1, the rain that was forecast didn’t fall, and Ivan Nova provided superb relief of C.C. Sabathia.
lead_paragraph: When the American League division series resumed Saturday night, still Game 1, the rain that was forecast didn’t fall, and Ivan Nova provided superb relief of C.C. Sabathia.

headline.main: Showers Come and Go, Leaving Behind a Rainbow
headline.print_headline: Showers Come and Go, Leaving Behind a Rainbow
headline.seo: 2011 A.L. Division Series: Forecast for Saturday Night: Something Will Happen
